turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Fault in Our Stars (film).
turn.1: What happened to the bench in The Fault in Our Stars?
turn.2: On July 2, 2014, "The Guardian" reported that the bench had gone missing, and city officials said they did not know where it was.
turn.3: Was anyone arrested for its theft?
turn.4: Amsterdam city spokesman, Stephan van der Hoek said: "It's a bit embarrassing, because we do keep good track of them, but it's gone all right".
turn.6: He promised to install a new bench within weeks.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Just a week later, "Entertainment Weekly" said the Amsterdam film office had tweeted a photograph taken during the re-installation of the stolen bench; Amsterdam film commissioner Simon Brester said it was the same bench, not a replacement.
turn.10: Filming in Pittsburgh included the interior scenes at the Anne Frank House, which was recreated on a soundstage at Pittsburgh Studios located in Churchill, Pennsylvania, in the east suburbs of Pittsburgh.
turn.11: Was there any controversy during the filming?
turn.12: Production designer Molly Hughes and art director Greg Weimerskirch built three different studio sets in Pittsburgh, one for each floor.
